thread.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger `in no hurry` to sign 4-yr-old divorce papers
thread.title_full: Arnold Schwarzenegger `in no hurry` to sign 4-yr-old divorce papers - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger `in no hurry` to sign 4-yr-old divorce papers
text:
If sources are to be believed, then Arnold Schwarzenegger is dragging his feet in his divorce with wife Maria Shriver.
READ: Arnold - Maria Schwarzenegger give `special birthday wishes` to son Patrick
The 59-year-old journalist had filed for divorce back in July 2011, but the 68-year-old actor still hasn't signed the divorce documents, TMZ.com reports.
According to a source, whenever Shriver says she wants to move on in her life, the Terminator Genisys actor "drags his feet."
Schwarzenegger and Shriver, who tied the knot on April 26, 1986, parted ways in 2011.
